parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method you specify when you purchase an ordinary instance.

Valid values:

*   PREPAY: subscription
*   POSTPAY: pay-as-you-go

parameters.name: ClbNetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the purchased Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance that is billed based on LCUs.

*   pubnet: Internet
*   privatenet: private network
*   privatepubnet: Internet and private network

parameters.name: EnableHardwareAcceleration
parameters.description: Specifies whether to activate Tracing Analysis.

parameters.name: EnableSls
parameters.description: The tag of the gateway.

parameters.name: EnableXtrace
parameters.description: The sampling rate of Tracing Analysis. Valid values: \[1,100].

parameters.name: EnterpriseSecurityGroup
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable hardware acceleration.

parameters.name: InternetSlbSpec
parameters.description:
The specifications of the Internet-facing Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance. Valid values:

*   slb.s1.small
*   slb.s2.smal
*   slb.s2.medium
*   slb.s3.small
*   slb.s3.medium
*   slb.s3.large

parameters.name: MserVersion
parameters.description:
The MSE instance type. Valid values:

*   mse_pro: ordinary instance
*   mse_serverless: serverless instance

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The ID of the region.

parameters.name: NlbNetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance you specify when you purchase a serverless instance.

*   pubnet: Internet
*   privatenet: private network
*   privatepubnet: Internet and private network

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description:
The specifications of the internal-facing Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance. Valid values:

*   slb.s1.small
*   slb.s2.small
*   slb.s2.medium
*   slb.s3.small
*   slb.s3.medium
*   slb.s3.large

parameters.name: Replica
parameters.description: The number of nodes you specify when you purchase an ordinary instance.

parameters.name: RequestPars
parameters.description: The extended field.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: SlbSpec
parameters.description:
The specifications of the internal-facing Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance. Valid values:

*   slb.s1.small
*   slb.s2.small
*   slb.s2.medium
*   slb.s3.small
*   slb.s3.medium
*   slb.s3.large

parameters.name: Spec
parameters.description:
The node specifications you specify when you purchase an ordinary instance. Valid values:

*   MSE_GTW\_16\_32\_200\_c(16C32G)
*   MSE_GTW\_2\_4\_200\_c(2C4G)
*   MSE_GTW\_4\_8\_200\_c(4C8G)
*   MSE_GTW\_8\_16\_200\_c(8C16G)

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag object.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the primary vSwitch.

parameters.name: VSwitchId2
parameters.description: Specifies whether to use an advanced security group.

parameters.name: Vpc
parameters.description: The ID of the primary vSwitch.

parameters.name: XtraceRatio
parameters.description: Specifies whether to activate Log Service.

parameters.name: ZoneInfo
parameters.description: The details of the zone.
